name: asyncapi-v3-template-final
description: A template that generates a Python MQTT client using MQTT.

server.description: The server you want to use in the code.

scripts.test:generate: asyncapi generate fromTemplate test/fixtures/asyncapi.yml ./ --output test/project --force-write --param server=dev
scripts.test: npm run test:clean && npm run test:generate && npm run test:start
